Grilled Tomato Bruschetta Recipe

Ingredients:

  • 4 large tomatoes, sliced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1 baguette, sliced
  • 1/2 cup fresh basil, chopped
  • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese

Instructions:

  1. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
  2. In a bowl, toss the sliced tomatoes with the minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper until coated.
  3. Grill the tomato slices for 2-3 minutes per side or until lightly charred.
  4. Meanwhile, brush the sliced baguette with olive oil and grill for 1-2 minutes per side or until toasted.
  5. Top each baguette slice with a grilled tomato slice, chopped basil, and grated Parmesan cheese.
  6. Serve immediately and enjoy!
